name: Idle Wool Tycoon
description:
Welcome to the most exciting farm idle game! Are you ready to manage your own sheep farm and become the richest man alive?

—Unlock and upgrade variety of sheep shearing tools
—Sell TONS of wool
—Insane POWER-UPS to multiply your earnings!
—Build your FARM EMPIRE !!!!

Can you unlock all kinds of tools to become the ULTIMATE wool tycoon? Come and accept the challenge!
